introduction.title: Who am I?
introduction.text: I am Ngo Truong Son, or to be short, you can call me Son. Since primary school, I've had a deep passion for computer science and demonstrated my talent in this area (For example, I won the national first prize in an informatic competition for primary student in Vietnam). Although later on I chose to specialize in mathematics in secondary school (because I believed it was the best subject to hone my reasoning skills), I never forgot to cultivate my knowledge and skills in computer science. And now, I'm confident to pursue my dreams in the Information Technology department at INSA Lyon in France. /n Throughout my 3 years at INSA, I have continuously strived to enhance my knowledge and skills to meet my passion and find the most suitable field in information technology for myself. I have accumulated a wealth of knowledge in web development (front-end, back-end), app development, etc., and I'm still pushing myself even further to pursue my dreams. /nAt the moment, I'm looking for an internship opportunity for this summer where I can challenge myself in a real company environment. If your company needs a young and dynamic intern, I would be a good candidate. Below are four qualities that I believe best represent myself; if you find me interesting, don't forget to leave a message for me in the contact section!

strengths.title: Curiousity
strengths.text: My insatiable curiosity drives me to explore new areas and deepen my knowledge.

strengths.title: Responsibility
strengths.text: I always strive to complete assigned tasks and become reliable in my responsibilities.

strengths.title: Adaptability
strengths.text: I can adapt to changes and am capable of quickly adjusting to new situations.

strengths.title: Creativity
strengths.text: Not only does creativity give me some talent in design, but it also enables me to think of innovative solutions and think outside the box.
